foods.recipe:
1. Prepare pizza dough
2. Spread tomato sauce
3. Add fresh mozzarella
4. Top with fresh basil leaves
5. Bake at 450°F for 12-15 minutes
6. Drizzle with olive oil before serving

1. Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices
2. Sauté onions and garlic
3. Add marinated chicken
4. Pour in coconut milk
5. Simmer for 25-30 minutes
6. Garnish with fresh cilantro

1. Chop assorted vegetables
2. Heat wok with oil
3. Stir fry vegetables on high heat
4. Add soy sauce and sesame oil
5. Cook for 5-7 minutes
6. Serve hot with rice

1. Cream butter and sugars
2. Add eggs and vanilla
3. Mix dry ingredients separately
4. Combine wet and dry ingredients
5. Fold in chocolate chips
6. Bake at 350°F for 10-12 minutes

1. Chop romaine lettuce
2. Prepare Caesar dressing
3. Grill chicken breast
4. Toss lettuce with dressing
5. Top with grilled chicken
6. Sprinkle parmesan and croutons

1. Brown ground beef
2. Add taco seasoning
3. Warm tortillas
4. Fill with seasoned beef
5. Top with cheese, lettuce, tomatoes
6. Serve with salsa and sour cream

1. Prepare sushi rice
2. Lay nori sheet
3. Spread rice evenly
4. Add fillings (salmon, cucumber)
5. Roll tightly
6. Slice and serve with soy sauce

1. Chop cucumbers and tomatoes
2. Add red onion
3. Sprinkle feta cheese
4. Add kalamata olives
5. Dress with olive oil and oregano
6. Toss and serve chilled

1. Mash ripe bananas
2. Mix with butter and sugar
3. Add eggs and vanilla
4. Combine dry ingredients
5. Mix wet and dry ingredients
6. Bake at 350°F for 50-60 minutes

1. Prepare vegetable filling
2. Make bechamel sauce
3. Layer lasagna noodles
4. Add vegetable filling
5. Top with cheese
6. Bake at 375°F for 45 minutes
